label: 渤海
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Name of a kingdom in Manchuria, Mongolia and Siberia, lasting from about 712 to 927 when it was finally conquered by the Ch'i-tan. It was a successor to Kōkuli (Koma), and in turn was supplanted by the Empire of the Ch'i-tan. [契丹, 高句麗]
